Combat
Hit Points: 89 Armor Class: 22 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Champion: 15 (strength; trained); Fighter: 20 (strength; trained)
Armor: Chain Mail Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 8; HP 64) Weapons: Bola (+12 1d6+3 B R20'; dexterity; expert); Light Mace (+12 1d4+3 B; strength; expert); Main-gauche (+12 1d4+3 P/S; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:

Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Unconventional Weaponry (Spirit Thresher): Weapon Familiarity (Spirit Thresher)
Fighter Weapon Mastery: Critical hits with a master proficiency weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Retributive Strike: (R) Gives an ally within aura resistance 7 to the triggering damage from within aura and allows self to make a melee Strike against the attacker if within reach
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Save: Fortitude: +11 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +12 (dexterity; expert); Will: +10 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes:
Bravery: Save Expert (Will)
Bravery: Successes on Will saves vs. fear are critical successes, and the initial severity of frightened conditions is reduced by 1
Magic
Focus Points: 1 Attack: Divine: +9 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Divine: 19 (charisma; trained)
Spells: Shields Of The Spirit (D1 Foc): (1) While shield is raised, self aura gives allies +1 Armor Class and inflicts 1d4 HP spirit on attacking foes for 1 rd (heightened +2 inflicts +1d4 HP)
Magic Notes:
Devout Magic: Spell Trained (Divine)/Has a focus pool
Shields Of The Spirit: Knows the Shields Of The Spirit divine spell
Notes
Validation Errors:
